com.amazonaws.greengrass.streammanager.client

Class StreamManagerClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.greengrass.streammanager.client.StreamManagerClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamManagerClient, AutoCloseable

    public class StreamManagerClientImpl
extends Object
implements StreamManagerClient
    StreamManagerClientImpl is a client that communicates with StreamManager server.

        Specified by:

      • readMessages

        public List<Message> readMessages(String stream,
                                  ReadMessagesOptions options)
                           throws StreamManagerException
        Read message(s) from a chosen stream with options. If no options are specified it will try to read 1 message from the stream.

        Default options used when reading from the stream: desiredStartSequenceNumber: 0, minMessageCount: 1, maxMessageCount: 1, readTimeoutMillis: 0 // Where 0 here represents that the server will immediately return the messages // or an exception if there were not enough messages available.

        If desiredStartSequenceNumber is specified in the options and is less than the current beginning of the stream, returned messages will start at the beginning of the stream and not necessarily the desiredStartSequenceNumber.

        Specified by:
        readMessages in interface StreamManagerClient
        Parameters:
        stream - the name of the stream.
        options - the options of readMessages() operation.
        Returns:
        a list of messages. empty if there is no message to read.
        Throws:
        StreamManagerException - if any error is returned from the server

      • listStreams

        public List<String> listStreams()
                         throws StreamManagerException
        List the streams in StreamManager. Returns a list of their names.
        Specified by:
        listStreams in interface StreamManagerClient
        Returns:
        a list of stream names. empty if there are no streams.
        Throws:
        StreamManagerException - if any error is returned from the server.
